availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas M. Green (Maysville, Kentucky, newspaper editor)

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, newspaper editor. Kentucky native. Son of Mary K. Green. Married to Nancy Green. Father of John Green, Bessie Green, and Pearce Green. Editor of The Weekly Maysville Eagle from 1863 to 1876.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 40; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 1, p. 4; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Mason County, KY, September 1863, p. 137, (Accessed via ancestry.com); "The Weekly Maysville Eagle," Chronicling America (http://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84027432/) (Accessed on August 25, 2017).
